trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox"></xref> types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
The element associated with this automation peer.

Gets the accelerator key for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.
Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey*>.
A string that contains the accelerator key.

Gets the accelerator key combinations for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.

The accelerator key combinations for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.

Gets the class name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.
The class name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.

Gets the text that describes the functionality of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox"></xref> control that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText*>.

The text that describes the functionality of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox"></xref> control that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.
Gets the name that describes the element that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>.
The name that describes the element that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.

Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.
A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
An object that supports the control pattern if patternInterface is the , , , , or value; otherwise, .

Sends a request to activate the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IInvokeProvider> interface.
